website_summaries.verdict: This shield is great for all users, beginning or advanced.
pros: This product can last 4 to 5 years and is resilient under constant blows
The handle placement makes it versatile and the lightweight material makes it easy to transport and comfortable to hold
cons: The packaging has a smell to it that takes a while to get rid of

customer_reviews.title: Great Kicking Shield
customer_reviews.text: This bag is very thick and solid. I got this one that is so thick because I use it strapped to a pole, support beam, or tree. This way I can work on my low kicks without needing another person. This shield can take the hardest kicks with no problem. Because it is so thick, I never have to worry about my foot making contact with the pole. The shield is firm and does not give much at all. But it is not hard enough to condition the shins much for muay thai roundhouse kicks. I expect it to last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Eric B

customer_reviews.title: Super thick, good for Muay Thai training at home
customer_reviews.text: I have it ratchet-strapped to a big cement column in my apartment and it's like having a mini heavy bag. There are lots of straps, loops and handles on the back so numerous ways your can mount it or hold it. I can practice straight punches, elbows, knees and kicks no problem. It's not as hard as a standard Thai pad, but still stiff enough to make enough noise to annoy the neighbors. Can't speak to durability yet, but so far seems like a well made product.
customer_reviews.author: asingh

customer_reviews.title: It's big and thick!
customer_reviews.text: I have four of these in my karate school, and I'm here today to buy another one. We have used them for years. They are about the size of a fit person's torso, including in thickness. They absorb very hard kicks... enough to knock the holder back three or four feet... without damage to the holder. The students love them.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce D. Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Good, but...
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty awesome product. My only knock on this product is for those of you who practice Muay Thai. It's not stiff enough to help with any type of shin conditioning. You would benefit more from a stiffer pad to practice kicks on.
customer_reviews.author: Moon A.

customer_reviews.title: I'm impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Looks way better in person. Surprisingly light! I'm a pretty big guy, 6' 2", 280 - 285 lbs. Practiced a few leg kicks with my wife holding it up and she had no problem holding it up. I just sold my muay thai bag and stand to save space and this is a great alternative! Very reasonably priced! Thanks to all the reviews which helped me make my decision.
customer_reviews.author: Warren

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and construction, I am buying another one I was so impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Great Pad for the price! I was honestly expecting cheap construction and a pad that I could abuse for just a few month, I was wrong. This pad is very sturdy and has very good construction, stitching and materials. I had a coworker hold it while I delivered a few hard kicks and it took the abuse. He felt it a bit through the pad but I am 280lbs and throwing a very hard kick. The only negative is the pad is quite "soft" and there is a lot of cushion, shin conditioning will not happen from kicking this pad IMO. I am going to buy another one because I was so impressed with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Deakin Donley

customer_reviews.title: Improves a student's focus and power
customer_reviews.text: This bag is THICK. If you have adults who have learned to kick like nobody's business, this bag will help you train them to kick even harder! Side kick? No problem. Back kick? No problem. Reverse turning kick (also known as spinning heel)? No problem. This bag has a smaller surface area than other, lighter bags I have used, but this only increases the student's need to improve their targeting and focus. This bag helps improve a student's focus and power. Can't ask for much more than this from a kicking shield! Will buy another when needed!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Swope

customer_reviews.title: Best kicking pad I've used
customer_reviews.text: Very solid kicking pad, capable of absorbing strong kicks without hurting the person holding it. The only downside is that the handles are a little small, but I can work with it.
customer_reviews.author: William Kerney

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this kicking shield
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty good, soft enough you can really bury your shins in it while training your round kicks, nice for push kicks too. Absorbs the impact for the coach pretty well. Not much for shin conditioning though, wish it had a little more of a curve in the middle but overall I like it for Muay Thai training.
customer_reviews.author: S. J.

customer_reviews.title: Lasts a lifetime
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I've made. 12 years later (purchased 10/2006) still the same. I couldn't count how many kicks it's taken, from comrades to now my kids. Definition of durable.
customer_reviews.author: Zach G

customer_reviews.title: Nice shield, could be softer.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice body shield with plenty of options for holding. The only negative information that I can provide is that the general consensus in the dojo is that it's too firm and doesn't absorb enough impact. Thus, transferring too much energy to the person holding it. The shield is not as wide or tall as the Century product, but it's almost twice as thick.
customer_reviews.author: rabmparker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shield!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shield! Much thicker than the ones used at our school. The model I received is slightly different than the on in the picture. Mine has air vents on each side to allow air to get out when the shield is kicked or punched. It is also very light and easy to use! I've asked some friends to kick it as hard as they can and the impact is very well redistributed! Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Q. T. Vo

customer_reviews.title: Best kicking shield for the price you pay.
customer_reviews.text: If you want to go cheap and durable, this is the shield for you. Great for roundhouse, sidekicks, spin backkicks, front kicks, etc. Very good grippers in the back to brace for them power kicks. If you are looking for a hard Muay Thai shield, this is definitely not for you. Very soft and light.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Bernal

customer_reviews.title: I like it so much
customer_reviews.text: This really takes the heavy hits. I'm a 5'4", 132 lbs, and I'll use this to brace hits from 6', 230 lbs, and I won't feel the blow through the shield. I like it so much, I'm buying a second.
customer_reviews.author: Superheroes fan

customer_reviews.title: Big and beefy.
customer_reviews.text: Very thick but not quite as soft and giving as the expensive ones in our DOJO. Nice handles to hold at any angle. Nice quality material. Good value compared to others.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what i wanted it to be
customer_reviews.text: This absorbs some big blows. Versatile and durable. Vents out the air from compression of strikes. Comfortable to hold. This is exactly what I was hoping for. Thanks tiger claw.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish it had more of a bend in it, ...
customer_reviews.text: Wish it had more of a bend in it, but overall it works. It's a bit smaller than I expected as well, but again it does it's job.
customer_reviews.author: JustMyOpinion

customer_reviews.title: My kid absolutely loves it... as do I.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my child who's taking TKD. It's the exact same model they use in their TKD dojang. My child's able to practice moves/kicks/punches with this on our own time at home. A well built piece of equipment. Worth the investment if you and your child are motivated to practice your TaeKwonDo at home.
customer_reviews.author: the Accidental Gamer

customer_reviews.title: great product!
customer_reviews.text: This product has been used by multiple men well over 200lbs at the black belt level. This product really gets abused and has held up very well. The handles and stitching are perfect. The thick padding is doing exactly what it's supposed to do. I would recommend this product to anyone looking for a good kicking shield. When this one wears out I would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: antonius

customer_reviews.title: Hit me with your best shot....
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for Striking, kicking or knees. We use to use the regular thickness strike shields until we found these. Much better for students who are holding the pads and better for those doing the hitting. I would recommend these to anyone who wants to save themselves from the bumps and bruises associated with contact sports or self defense classes.
customer_reviews.author: dsurfer3

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: i bought this shield, because myself and other people i train with can kick normal shields to have the material pop out the air holes. I have had it over two months and use it 2 times a week and it holds up to the beat downs we give it. 5 stars for me. Only down side which is not much at all is sometimes when kicking if the person holding it is off and your toe comes into contact with the air-vents, can sting a little since it is aluminum. but other than that being the downside its great.
customer_reviews.author: daniel brown

customer_reviews.title: Super heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: I've been in MMA for almost 10 years and this is the thickest, most comfortable kicking shield I have ever used. While it is quite bulky in comparison to the traditional kicking shields, the protection this shield provides is without comparison. definitely the best I've ever used and would definitely recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great work out bag for the price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome perfect for practicing all your kicks, got one similar to it 37 yrs ago from Bushisdikan Worriers out of Missoula Montana best Marshall Arts in Mont.
customer_reviews.author: Star

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a tough kick shield.
customer_reviews.text: All our guys are over 200 lbs and it absorbs kicks and knees really well.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Item.
customer_reviews.text: This item is constructed very well. Purchased this item for personal training and self defense classes i teach. Compared to other items this one was very affordable and was alot thicker. It can take a ton of abuse and does not even have a scratch on it. Still looks new even after my amatuer and pro mma guys have gotten ahold of it. If your looking for well constructed and well made pad this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: Greensun88

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shield for high powered kicks
customer_reviews.text: Large, sturdy and an excellent training aide. The handles on the back are comfortable for the person holding the shield. This is a really dense target, great for absorbing kicks.
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son who has been doing martial arts for the past 6 months, he uses it to practice at home. The handles are sturdy and the pad is well built. Again, this is used for my son, not sure how it will hold up if an adult were to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Great, not sure of durability yet
customer_reviews.text: The material is perfect for repetitive skin contact and the pad seems to absorb hard shots very well.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Good quality bag with solid straps to hold the bag. I am not a small guy and it absorbs my kicks MUCH better than some of the competitors gear made for the same purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Honest reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Great value. There are plenty of straps for many options. The straps appear to be stitched very well. The padding is a lot thicker than other bags in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: biirb

customer_reviews.title: Durable and high quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is our 2nd, first is still going strong 2 years in!
customer_reviews.author: uwbon2run

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Durable and can take High Impact
customer_reviews.text: Good value for a sturdy shield that can take high impact from beginner to advanced strikers. I recommend this product if you want something that will last.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Best Kicking Shield By far
customer_reviews.text: This kicking shield is like no other I have seen. I have held kicking shields through which I could feel the sting of the kicks being executed. This one is not like that. This shield absorbs the total impact of a kick and spreads it out to an effect like being pushed by a big cushion. Now it will not stop a kick from moving the holder back or knocking the holder down if they are much smaller than the kicker. But it will absorb the edge of the kick so that its direct impact does not come through.
customer_reviews.author: Fearless Velocity

customer_reviews.title: excellent buy.
customer_reviews.text: A well constructed product, definitely absorbs kicks and punches well. Wish that the the holding handles were just a bit tighter, but for the price, excellent buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: it shipped a little late but it was well worth the wait. i love it.great weight and feels like you can kick for days. my student love it as well. great peace of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: that_guy67

customer_reviews.title: It works. I think it is too thick though ...
customer_reviews.text: It works. I think it is too thick though and unless you are holding bags for Alister Overeem I'm not sure you would need a bag this thick. I knocked off a star because the bag gave off a very strong off gassing toxic smell of nylon. So much to the point where it truly gave me a head ache and I stopped training a couple of time because of it when I first bought the product. I think it is done off gassing now I'm not noticing any more heads but jeeze it was strong. So strong I maybe should have given this 3 stars but I won't do that.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: After many beatings this shield has held up. Great Buy!
customer_reviews.author: Big Poppa

customer_reviews.title: Tough construction
customer_reviews.text: It can take bus-like hits without destoying the holders’ arms. In this case, my beautiful wife for example
customer_reviews.author: pascual oyola

customer_reviews.title: Kick it Hard
customer_reviews.text: This bag will take a lot of abuse. It is thick so the person holding it is well protected. Really like the holding straps too. Wish it had a little more curve to it, but overall my students like it a lot as do I. -Sifu Brazell
customer_reviews.author: First Hunt Guy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome pad. It's very thick. You can do full power kicks unlike other pads.
customer_reviews.author: Al J

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I purchased this. It's nice and thick. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Come at me, braaaaah!
customer_reviews.text: A large target with lots of padding. It works great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great kick bag, it is actually better than the ones at my daughters karate school. might want to get some gloves for kids hands the bag is a bit solid when new. I played around with this bag with my brothers, it held up great for adults. really like all the handles
customer_reviews.author: todd

customer_reviews.title: Great kick pad
customer_reviews.text: This a great kick pad at a fair price. Seems extra thick to help absorb full force punches and kicks.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best shield our dojo has ever used. Very well made and the thicker padding absorbs all out striking
customer_reviews.author: Jacob W.

customer_reviews.title: Super Kicking shield
customer_reviews.text: Service was fast. Great cushion surface, allowing kicker to be able to put some power on their kicks without worry of hurting holder.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Durable.
customer_reviews.text: This kicking shield is exactly as described on the site. It is made very durable with high attention to detail.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth339

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Can be hit & hit very hard & the padding stays intact.
customer_reviews.author: TapouT

customer_reviews.title: Shield - Takes a lot of kicking
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to grandchildren for Christmas. They are enjoying it a lot and say that it is big enough for all their kicking. Their ages are 10 - 14.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for Krav Maga training with my daughter. It is a great shield for the money. Much thicker than standard shields. It should protect my ribs well which is good because my kid kicks like a horse. Shipping could have been quicker.
customer_reviews.author: Dasha's Dad

customer_reviews.title: KICK SHEILDS
customer_reviews.text: BUY THESE YOU WILL NOT BE DISAPPOINTTED, THEY HOLD UP TO THE HARDEST KICKS AND LAST. I RUN A MARTIAL ARTS SCHOOL AND HAVE TRYED MANY PADS. THIS IS THE ONLY PAD I BUY NOW. THICK AND HARD. GREAT FOR BOTH KICKER AND HOLDER. SHIPPING WAS ALSO GOOD. TURN AROUND TIME FROM WHEN I ORDERD THEM WAS 4 DAYS, BUY THEM YOU WILL AGREE.
customer_reviews.author: Rob G

customer_reviews.title: Make sure they send you what you ordered.
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to receiving a 25" tall 15" wide 8.5" thick kicking pad. Instead I received a 18"x10"x6", Thai Style Kicking Pad that was super dense and nothing like the picture. I waited for two weeks, just to be disappointed and now have to reorder, plus wait to be reimbursed.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: ... ordered two of these shields and they don't look like the one's I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these shields and they don't look like the one's I ordered. They have TC2000 series on the front and the handles are different on the back also. Why?
customer_reviews.author: Richard Coppens

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this kick shield! I've trained muay thai for several years and me and my training partners can throw kicks as hard as possible at this and the holder barely feels a thing. It's VERY thick. Handles are good quality and there are adjustable straps on the back side to allow for many different holding positions. Feels really good to kick too
customer_reviews.author: Jason Klein

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bag. Son loves this for his martial arts practice at home
customer_reviews.author: Healing

product_meta.title: Tiger Claw Shield - Super Kicking Shield
product_meta.description: The ultimate protection designed for advanced students using full power. Made of extra strong nylon and high density foam. Provide maximum protection and absorbs full contact. Dimensions are 26" x14" x8". Sold Individually
feature_bullets: The ultimate protection designed for advanced students using full power.
Provide maximum protection and absorbs full contact.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
